story.author: Merry Sandheaver
story.headline: HomeExpo date and place announced
story.subheading: UK's number one furnishing exhibition is coming to Birmingham!

article.p: The biggest furnishing exhibition in the UK has announced it will be taking place at the Birmingham National Exhibition Centre, on 21st of August.

The first list of companies to be present has been released and it includes the award-winning Sustainable Life Styles and Rosemount Woods Inc. Some 200 exhibitors are expected to set up stands at this year's event.
According to the website, every sector of furniture and interiors will be in attendance, including retailers, independents, interior designers, architects and developers.
